ai-patthana16.53:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.53:0.3_0: for those who attack themselves, etc., and for those who don’t attack themselves.
ai-patthana16.53:1.1_0: It is the condition for the resentment, not for the sake of accumulating, not for the province of the Dhamma, and for the purpose of (good) mentioned, not for the sake of accumulating condition.
ai-patthana16.53:1.1_1: The three (goods) have been planted in brief, and the three watches of the night, when there was none of these three watches.
ai-patthana16.53:2.1_0: Such is the cause, not the reason for the invisible, not for the sake of impingement, and for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of defilement.
